P

payment(Principal) - Method in class com.example.ex4template.controllers.ConsumerController
Handles payment for the products, in case a product is missing from the stock at the moment of payment, the payment will not be made and the basket will be displayed with appropriate messages.

ProductNotExistException - Exception in com.example.ex4template.services
An exception class that is thrown in the event that you try to update and pay for a product whose quantity in the database is equal to 0.
